solution_line_template: First find the total number of times the cost is halved: {matty_age} years / {halving_interval} years/halving = {num_halvings} halvings
Then halve the cost a second time: ${cost_after_first_halving} / {halving_factor} = $<<{cost_after_first_halving}/{halving_factor}={cost_after_second_halving}>>{cost_after_second_halving}
Then halve the cost a third time: ${cost_after_second_halving} / {halving_factor} = $<<{cost_after_second_halving}/{halving_factor}={cost_after_third_halving}>>{cost_after_third_halving}
